sentences.english: Ever since she was six years old, Loryn has yearned to visit India.
sentences.chinese: 從六歲開始，洛恩就嚮往遊覽印度。

sentences.english: Please obey the rules, NOT to crowd or play around when you are touring.
sentences.chinese: 參觀遊覽時，請遵守秩序，不要擁擠打鬧。

sentences.english: Getting around in Tabora can be done in several ways.
sentences.chinese: 遊覽塔寶拉有幾種方法。

sentences.english: Where should we visit around here other than Borough Market?
sentences.chinese: 除了博羅市集，我們還應該遊覽一下什麼地方呢？

sentences.english: Stop and visit the medieval castle.
sentences.chinese: 停下來遊覽這個中世紀的古堡。

sentences.english: Candy and his sister are visiting the zoo.
sentences.chinese: 肯迪和他妹妹正在遊覽動物園。

sentences.english: Today very pleased to have this opportunity to visit together with you the beautiful HeZhou.
sentences.chinese: 今天非常高興有機會與各位一起遊覽美麗的賀州。

sentences.english: He wished for others to see and experience it as well.
sentences.chinese: 他希望其他人也來遊覽，還來體驗這片土地。

sentences.english: Tainan and its surrounding area have many places of historical interest to visit.
sentences.chinese: 臺南和其周圍地區有許多歷史名勝可遊覽。

sentences.english: Last summer we did five countries in two weeks.
sentences.chinese: 去年夏天我們在兩週內遊覽了五國。

sentences.english: We do, however, apply your upgrade to every day you have surfed in that month.
sentences.chinese: 不過我們確實將你的提升用於那個月你遊覽的每一天。

sentences.english: Experience the best of Canberra on this full day Hop-On Hop-Off sightseeing Discovery tour of the Australian capital city.
sentences.chinese: 乘坐堪培拉城市觀光遊覽車去遊覽澳大利亞的首都。

sentences.english: Experience the best of Canberra on this full day Hop-On Hop-Off sightseeing Discovery tour of the Australian capital city.
sentences.chinese: 乘坐堪培拉城市觀光遊覽車去遊覽澳大利亞的首都。

sentences.english: Well, I call on you to join with me visit the famous East Lake Scenic Area.
sentences.chinese: 好，下面請大家隨我一起去遊覽著名的東湖風景區。

sentences.english: Nine new attractions have been added since 1992.
sentences.chinese: 自一九九二年以來，共增闢了9個遊覽點。

sentences.english: Please be patient to enjoy your moment on the Skywalk.
sentences.chinese: 請耐心的享受你遊覽空中通道的這一刻吧。

definition: to look at sth with pleasure/to watch (sth marvelous)/ornamental
to amuse oneself/to have fun/to go sightseeing/to take a stroll
to taste a small amount/to sample
to seek by inquiry or search/to call on/to visit
to have a taste of/to realize/to appreciate
to ride (in a car or carriage)/to drive/to motor
